API name: Tomorrow CO2 Signal REST API v1
Description: Tomorrow is an organization that promotes the efficient use of energy resources. The Tomorrow CO2 Signal API provides carbon footprint detection mechanism that makes it possible for a smart device to consume electricity when the carbon footprint is at its lowest. It provides access to information about the source and production procedures of electricity supply as well as the quantity of carbon attributable to its production. The API sends requests and returns responses in JSON format.
